name: COVESTRO LLC
govEntities: Centers For Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS)
sampleDescriptions:
Outreach and monitoring related to comprehensive tax reform and tax extenders.
Monitor the implementation of P.L. 115-97, Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

Outreach and monitoring related to fuel efficiency standards and vehicle requirements for lightweight materials.

S. 1885, AV Start Act.

Monitor legislative and administrative action related to miscellaneous tariff legislation. 
H.R.4318, Miscellaneous Tariff Bill Act of 2017.

Outreach and monitoring related to USACE projects in Texas.
Outreach and monitoring related to the implementation of the Frank R. Lautenberg Chemical Safety for the 21st Century Act (P.L. 114-182).

Outreach and monitoring regarding legislative and administrative action on appropriations and budget issues.
Outreach and monitoring related to USACE projects in Texas.
H.R. 1625, Consolidated Omnibus
